title: In Conversation: How America’s 9/11 response led to the Capitol insurrection
itunes:title: In Conversation: How America’s 9/11 response led to the Capitol insurrection
description: In his latest film for ‘Frontline,’ documentary filmmaker Michael Kirk lays out how the United States went from a moment of national unity after an act of terrorism to an attack on our democracy by American citizens.
content:encoded: In his latest film for ‘Frontline,’ documentary filmmaker Michael Kirk lays out how the United States went from a moment of national unity after an act of terrorism to an attack on our democracy by American citizens.
